casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Raul Pachincano DIAZ 412P17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 8, 2017 Marilyn G. Ozer, Attorney at Law, Chapel Hill, for Diaz, Raul Pachicano. Neil C. Dalton, Special Deputy Attorney General, Kimberly S. Robb, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 8th of December 2017 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of December 2017."
